column1: #Text=Ikki says : " Asami , did you know Korra likes Mako ? "
#Text=" Korra says : " So , here 's your room .
#Text=I know this is a little rustic compared to what you 're used to .
#Text=" Asami says : " I think it 's really charming and the best part about it , nothing here reminds me of my father .
#Text=I swear if you do n't leave us alone , I 'm gon na - Uh , Tenzin !
#Text=" Asami says : " Thank you for having me .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Beifong 's replacement , Saikhan , is going to be inducted as the new Chief of Police later .
#Text=I think we should both be there .
